mapper.select: select * from users order by username
mapper.insert: insert into users (id, username, password, email, phone, description, createdUser) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{description}, #{createdUser})
mapper.update: update users set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
